book.synopsis:
A beautiful collection of 25 odes — in both English and Spanish — from one of greatest poets of the twentieth century.

Each poem in this collection is accompanied by a pair of exquisite pencil drawings. From bread and soap to a bed and a box of tea, the
collected here conjure up the essence of their subjects clearly and wondrously.

: ['Pablo Neruda', 'Ferris Cook', 'Ken K: Odes to Common Things, Bilingual Edition
